name: DISTORTIO, SEE YOU IN 2022
description:
Limited series of plotted ballpoint pencil cards.

The image was created using my ancient Risograph to print some pictures of my glass gears. After that I used the scanner to distort the images and plotted that distortion with ballpoint pen on top of the Riso.

As last year I am sending the physical cards to those who meant a lot for me and my practice in 2021 and those who I admire and hope to meet in 2022. This is the digital equivalent. Up for grabs, limited to one series of 22 cards. 

#seeyouin2022
